do well by doing good

About us

Before the Russian invasion, we were ordinary Ukrainians working as entrepreneurs, dentists, agricultural workers, pharmacists, and mechanical technicians, to name but a few! Now, we have all come together to form STAY SAFE UA, a humanitarian organization dedicated to helping the lives of Ukrainians living near the front lines of the Russian invasion.

1.5k

People Assisted

200+

Food Boxes Assembled

50+

Volunteers

we bring hope

how we help

Every week, our team of volunteers drive vans full of much-needed food, medical supplies and other forms of aid across the country. We deliver this aid to local hospitals, liberated towns, villages in the closed zones, refugee centers, elderly care homes and many others – wherever we can identify the most pressing needs thanks to our extensive list of local contacts.
